title: The Staff of the Archmagi

| ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |

|                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| Damage vs. small                      | 1d8 **+1d8**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| Damage vs. large                      | 1d10 **+1d8**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| To-hit bonus                          | **+1d5**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Bonus versus                          | fail [monster MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)") check or player without [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance")                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| Weapon skill                          | [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| Size                                  | one-handed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| Affiliation                           | - [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral")
- [intelligent artifact](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact")
- [forged artifact](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)")                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| When carried                          | * [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| When wielded                          | - [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance")
- [blocks 19⁄20 of curses](/index.php?title=Curse_resistance\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Curse resistance (page does not exist)")
- darkness source for [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)"), [light source](/wiki/Light_source "Light source") for other races
- spellcasting bonuses |
| When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") | * [phasing](/wiki/Phasing "Phasing")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| Base price                            | 35000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |

| Material                              | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

**The Staff of the Archmagi** is an [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is an [ashwood staff](/wiki/Ashwood_staff "Ashwood staff").

## Generation

The Staff of the Archmagi can only be created by combining [Magicbane](/wiki/Magicbane "Magicbane") and [Secespita](/wiki/Secespita "Secespita") at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") - it cannot be [wished](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for, and will revert to its base item if left in a [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") file.

## Description

The Staff of the Archmagi has +1d8 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and deals +1d8 damage against monsters that fail a check versus [magic saving throw](/wiki/Magic_saving_throw "Magic saving throw") and [player](/wiki/Player "Player") characters that lack [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") - it has the same additional effects as Magicbane, with the ability to [stun](/wiki/Stun "Stun"), [probe](/wiki/Probe "Probe") or [confuse](/wiki/Confuse "Confuse") hit monsters (but *not* [cancellation](/wiki/Cancellation "Cancellation")). Due to lacking cancellation magic, The Staff of the Archmagi can be safely stored in a [bag of holding](/wiki/Bag_of_holding "Bag of holding").

While carried, The Staff of the Archmagi confers [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage"). While wielded, it confers [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance"), blocks 19⁄20 of [curse items](/wiki/Curse_items "Curse items") and other cursing effects as with Magicbane, acts as a [light source](/wiki/Light_source "Light source") (or darkness source for [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters), and reduces [spellcasting](/wiki/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") failure rates by 1⁄2 for all spell schools. [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") The Staff of the Archmagi grants temporary [phasing](/wiki/Phasing "Phasing") for 51-150 more turns, with the duration of phasing added to the invoke timeout.

## Encyclopedia entry

"The staff in the hand of a wizard may be more than a prop  
for age," said Hama. He looked hard at the ash-staff on  
which Gandalf leaned.  
\[ The Two Towers, by J.R.R Tolkien ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=The_Staff_of_the_Archmagi\&action=edit)*

The Staff of the Archmagi

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
)   The Staff of the Archmagi    
Base item ashwood staff
Damage vs. small 1d8 +1d8
Damage vs. large 1d10 +1d8
To-hit bonus +1d5
Bonus versus fail monster MR check
or player without magic resistance
Weapon skill quarterstaff
Size one-handed
Affiliation
  • neutral
  • intelligent artifact
  • forged artifact
When carried
  • half spell damage
When wielded
  • magic resistance
  • blocks 19⁄20 of curses
  • darkness source for drow,
    light source for other races
  • spellcasting bonuses
When invoked
  • phasing
Base price 35000 zm
Weight 40
Material wood

The Staff of the Archmagi is an artifact weapon that appears in EvilHack. It is neutral, and its base item is an ashwood staff.

Generation

The Staff of the Archmagi can only be created by combining Magicbane and Secespita at a forge - it cannot be wished for, and will revert to its base item if left in a bones file.

Description

The Staff of the Archmagi has +1d8 to-hit and deals +1d8 damage against monsters that fail a check versus magic saving throw and player characters that lack magic resistance - it has the same additional effects as Magicbane, with the ability to stun, probe or confuse hit monsters (but not cancellation). Due to lacking cancellation magic, The Staff of the Archmagi can be safely stored in a bag of holding.

While carried, The Staff of the Archmagi confers half spell damage. While wielded, it confers magic resistance, blocks 19⁄20 of curse items and other cursing effects as with Magicbane, acts as a light source (or darkness source for drow characters), and reduces spellcasting failure rates by 1⁄2 for all spell schools. Invoking The Staff of the Archmagi grants temporary phasing for 51-150 more turns, with the duration of phasing added to the invoke timeout.

Encyclopedia entry

"The staff in the hand of a wizard may be more than a prop
for age," said Hama. He looked hard at the ash-staff on
which Gandalf leaned.
[ The Two Towers, by J.R.R Tolkien ]

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
